verses.text: Now \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H7586"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w kept|strong="H6113"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w close|strong="H6113"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H1368"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w They|strong="H2671"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* \w armed|strong="H5401"\w* \w with|strong="H5401"\w* \w bows|strong="H7198"\w*, \w and|strong="H7586"\w* could use both \w the|strong="H7586"\w* \w right|strong="H3231"\w* \w hand|strong="H3231"\w* \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H7586"\w* \w left|strong="H8041"\w* \w in|strong="H7586"\w* slinging stones \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w in|strong="H7586"\w* shooting \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \w from|strong="H3231"\w* \w the|strong="H7586"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*: \w they|strong="H2671"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* \w of|strong="H7198"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s brethren \w of|strong="H7198"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3058"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* Ahiezer; \w then|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w*, \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shemaah|strong="H8094"\w* \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w Gibeathite|strong="H1395"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeziel|strong="H3149"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Pelet|strong="H6404"\w*, \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beracah|strong="H1294"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w the|strong="H3058"\w* \w Anathothite|strong="H6069"\w*,

\w and|strong="H7970"\w* \w Ishmaiah|strong="H3460"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gibeonite|strong="H1393"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, \w and|strong="H7970"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, \w and|strong="H7970"\w* Jeremiah, \w and|strong="H7970"\w* Jahaziel, \w and|strong="H7970"\w* Johanan, \w and|strong="H7970"\w* Jozabad \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Gederathite,
Eluzai, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Jerimoth, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Bealiah, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Shemariah, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* Shephatiah \w the|strong="H3414"\w* Haruphite,
Elkanah, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Isshiah, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Azarel, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Joezer, \w and|strong="H3406"\w* Jashobeam, \w the|strong="H8203"\w* Korahites,
and Joelah, and Zebadiah, \w the|strong="H3449"\w* sons of Jeroham of Gedor.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Gadites \w there|strong="H4480"\w* separated themselves \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* David \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* stronghold \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* wilderness, \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* valor, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* trained \w for|strong="H1121"\w* war, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* could handle shield \w and|strong="H1121"\w* spear; \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* faces \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* faces \w of|strong="H1121"\w* lions, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* swift \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* roes upon \w the|strong="H4480"\w* mountains:
Ezer \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w chief|strong="H1368"\w*, Obadiah \w the|strong="H6440"\w* second, Eliab \w the|strong="H6440"\w* third,
Mishmannah \w the|strong="H5662"\w* fourth, Jeremiah \w the|strong="H5662"\w* fifth,
Attai \w the|strong="H3414"\w* sixth, Eliel \w the|strong="H3414"\w* seventh,
Johanan \w the|strong="H6262"\w* eighth, Elzabad \w the|strong="H6262"\w* ninth,
Jeremiah \w the|strong="H3076"\w* tenth, Machbannai \w the|strong="H3076"\w* eleventh.

These \w of|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3414"\w* Gad were captains \w of|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* host: \w he|strong="H3414"\w* that \w was|strong="H3414"\w* least \w was|strong="H3414"\w* equal \w to|strong="H6224"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hundred, \w and|strong="H3414"\w* \w the|strong="H3414"\w* greatest \w to|strong="H6224"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand.

These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* they \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w went|strong="H1121"\w* \w over|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Jordan \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w first|strong="H1121"\w* month, \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7218"\w* \w had|strong="H6635"\w* overflowed \w all|strong="H1419"\w* its banks; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* they put \w to|strong="H1121"\w* flight \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* valleys, both \w toward|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* east \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w toward|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* west.

\w And|strong="H7223"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w came|strong="H5674"\w* \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* children \w of|strong="H6010"\w* Benjamin \w and|strong="H7223"\w* Judah \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* stronghold \w unto|strong="H5674"\w* David.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w meet|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* answered \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* \w them|strong="H4480"\w*, \w If|strong="H1121"\w* ye \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w* peaceably \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w help|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w my|strong="H1732"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* knit \w unto|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w*; but \w if|strong="H1121"\w* \add ye be come\add* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* betray \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w mine|strong="H4480"\w* adversaries, seeing \w there|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* wrong \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* hands, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* fathers look thereon, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* rebuke \w it|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Spirit \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Amasai, \w who|strong="H6862"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* chief \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* thirty, \add and he said\add*, \w Thine|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* side, \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* son \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jesse: \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w helpers|strong="H5826"\w*; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w helpeth|strong="H5826"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w received|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* captains \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* band.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh \w also|strong="H1732"\w* \w there|strong="H7965"\w* fell \w away|strong="H5973"\w* some \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Philistines \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Saul \w to|strong="H5414"\w* battle: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lords \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Philistines \w upon|strong="H3847"\w* advisement \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w*, saying, \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* fall \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w master|strong="H5414"\w* Saul \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* jeopardy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* Ziklag, \w there|strong="H4480"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, Adnah, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Jozabad, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Jediael, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Michael, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Jozabad, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Elihu, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Zillethai, \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* thousands \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H6430"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* helped David \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w band|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* rovers: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H7218"\w* \w all|strong="H3212"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* valor, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w were|strong="H7218"\w* \w captains|strong="H7218"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* host.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* day \w to|strong="H1961"\w* day \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w until|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1368"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w these|strong="H1732"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* numbers \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heads \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* armed \w for|strong="H3588"\w* war, \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* Hebron, \w to|strong="H5704"\w* turn \w the|strong="H5921"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Saul \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* word \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \w that|strong="H3068"\w* bare shield \w and|strong="H3068"\w* spear \w were|strong="H1732"\w* six thousand \w and|strong="H3068"\w* eight hundred, \w armed|strong="H2502"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Simeon, \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* valor \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w*, seven thousand \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.
\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi four thousand \w and|strong="H3967"\w* six \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* Jehoiada \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* leader \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \add the house of\add* Aaron; \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w him|strong="H4480"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* three thousand \w and|strong="H3967"\w* seven \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*,

\w and|strong="H3967"\w* Zadok, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* young man \w mighty|strong="H7969"\w* \w of|strong="H5057"\w* valor, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H5057"\w* \w his|strong="H5973"\w* father’s house twenty \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w two|strong="H3967"\w* \w captains|strong="H5057"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6242"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w children|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Benjamin, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* brethren \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saul, three thousand: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* hitherto \w the|strong="H6659"\w* greatest part \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H8147"\w* \w had|strong="H8269"\w* kept \w their|strong="H8147"\w* allegiance \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Saul.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ephraim twenty thousand \w and|strong="H1121"\w* eight hundred, \w mighty|strong="H7969"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* valor, famous \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H8104"\w* fathers’ \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* thousand, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* mentioned \w by|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H1368"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w make|strong="H8034"\w* David king.

\w And|strong="H1732"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* children \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Issachar, \w men|strong="H8034"\w* \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* understanding \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* times, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* know \w what|strong="H1732"\w* Israel ought \w to|strong="H1732"\w* do, \w the|strong="H1732"\w* heads \w of|strong="H4294"\w* them \w were|strong="H1732"\w* \w two|strong="H4427"\w* hundred; \w and|strong="H1732"\w* all \w their|strong="H1732"\w* brethren \w were|strong="H1732"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w their|strong="H1732"\w* commandment.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* Zebulun, \w such|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* able \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* host, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* battle \w in|strong="H5921"\w* array, \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w manner|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H1121"\w* war, fifty thousand, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w could|strong="H3045"\w* order \add the battle array, and were\add* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* double heart.

\w And|strong="H2572"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* Naphtali \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand captains, \w and|strong="H2572"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* shield \w and|strong="H2572"\w* spear thirty \w and|strong="H2572"\w* seven thousand.

\w And|strong="H7970"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* Danites \w that|strong="H8269"\w* could set \w the|strong="H5973"\w* battle \w in|strong="H5973"\w* array, twenty \w and|strong="H7970"\w* eight thousand \w and|strong="H7970"\w* six hundred.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Asher, such \w as|strong="H6186"\w* \w were|strong="H4421"\w* able \w to|strong="H4480"\w* go \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* host, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* could \w set|strong="H6186"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w array|strong="H6186"\w*, forty thousand.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* other side \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Jordan, \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Reubenites, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Gadites, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H6635"\w* Manasseh, \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3318"\w* manner \w of|strong="H6635"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hundred \w and|strong="H3318"\w* twenty thousand.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w*, \w being|strong="H3627"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* could order \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w array|strong="H6635"\w*, \w came|strong="H6635"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* perfect heart \w to|strong="H4480"\w* Hebron, \w to|strong="H4480"\w* make David king \w over|strong="H4480"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w*: \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rest \w also|strong="H4519"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w* \w were|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* heart \w to|strong="H4480"\w* make David king.
